# index

**Instance Property**

The index in the argument table that corresponds to the function argument.

## Declaration

```swift
var index: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

A command encoder ([doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputeCommandEncoder] or [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderCommandEncoder]) specifies the index in the corresponding argument table. For example, an app can call the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputeCommandEncoder/setTexture(_:index:)] method of [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputeCommandEncoder] to specify an index in the texture argument table for an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTexture] instance that is used as an argument of a compute function.

## Describing the argument

- **name**: The name of the argument.
- **isActive**: A Boolean that indicates whether the compiled function uses the argument.
- **type**: The argument’s resource type.
- **access**: The argument’s read and/or write access.
